attributes.action: Stop using taxpayers money to bail out financial institutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many taxpayers have spent many years being told by banks that they could not borrow money or get a mortgage because they were too high a risk.  I feel that the banks are too high a risk to lend my tax to, they have demonstrated financial incompetence. I have had to listen to the vitues of the free market system from the Government, allow the free market system to run its course and give me back my tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
